<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">3232625c112202102a1fb9355ab03dc9</macroponent><name>Show Alert</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    if (event.payload.name !== 'updateEmergency') {
        return;
    }
    if (!event.payload.value) {
        return;
    }
    api.data.self_report_summary_1.refresh();
    api.setState('hideReportUpdate',false);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 17:32:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>7632625cf22202103baf574052fb43b5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show Alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_7632625cf22202103baf574052fb43b5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 17:32:45</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
